review_data.title: Good Italian place located close to airport and business parks
review_data.content: Had a business lunch here -- short taxi ride from the airport. Upmarket setting, with nice tableware and linen, and a good menu, with pasta, fish and meat. The ravioli was very good, and the service friendly and efficient.
